title: Linux view disk and folder

title: Detect remote port status
text: On Linux1234nc -vuz [IP] [PORT]eg: nc -vuz 103.218.243.55 22 nc is toolkit in Linux. On Windows1234telnet [IP] [PORT]eg: telnet 103.218.243.55 22 telnet can only detect TCP port. It can be installed like this: 1Control Panel -> Programs and Fuctions -> telnet client

title: Linux view port
text: View established port usage => ESTABLISHED1netstat -a View all port usage => LISTEN, ESTABLISHED1netstat -ap View specific port usage1netstat -ap | grep 8080 or 1lsof -i:8888 Kill specific program occupied port1kill -9 [PID] kill sends a signal to the PID process.The signal is SIGTERM by default.However, kill -9 sends SIGKILL which cannot be blocked by system, so it will kill process smoothly.

title: Linux searching files
text: Method 1character: fuzzy search 1whereis [FILENAME] Method 2character: accurate, large resources consuming 1find / -name [FILENAME] Method 3character: fastest, recommend 1locate [FILENAME]

title: Mounting directory
text: Mounting other Linux directory12$ sudo mkdir /mnt/wangfang-docs $ sudo mount -t cifs -o username='niy',password='123456' //192.168.251.15/Documents /mnt/wangfang-docs Mounting other Windows directory1$ mount -t nfs -o username='niy',password='123456' 192.168.20.204:/home/dir /home/dir

title: Linux file permissions
text: drwxrwxrwx d: File type1234567d -> directory- -> normal filel -> linkb -> block devicep -> pipe filec -> character devices -> socket file First drw ==> UserFile owner’s permissions. 123r -> readw -> writex -> execute Second drw ==> GroupFile owner’s group’s permissions. Last drw ==> OtherOther users’ permissions. Change file permissions12345678910$ sudo chmod [u/g/o/a] [+/-/=] [r/w/x] [FILENAME/DIRECTORY NAME]u -> Userg -> Groupo -> Othersa -> all+ -> add- -> remove= -> set

title: Linux change DNS
text: Change DNS file1$ sudo nano /etc/resolv.conf 123# Comment useless DNS servernameserver 8.8.8.8nameserver 8.8.4.4 Restart network1$ sudo service network restart Lock DNS file if neededIf you don’t want other program change DNS file, you can lock it. Make file read-only: 1$ sudo chattr +i /etc/resolv.conf Cancel file read-only: 1$ sudo chattr -i /etc/resolv.conf

title: Linux apt-get
text: Search package12$ sudo apt-get update$ sudo apt-cache search gcc or 12$ sudo apt-get update$ sudo apt-cache search all | grep gcc Uninstall packageRemove package with configure files -> ALL 1$ apt-get purge/apt-get –purge remove XXX Remove package without configure files 1$ sudo apt-get autoremove XXX or 1$ sudo apt-get remove XXX Clean packageRemove obsolete packages 1$ sudo apt-get autoclean Remove all unnecessarty packages 1$ sudo apt-get clean

title: Running Linux bash
text: Assuming hello.sh in the location /data/shell Method 112cd /data/shell./hello.sh Method 21/data/shell/hello.sh Method 312cd /data/shellbash hello.sh or 12cd /data/shellsh hello.sh Method 412cd /data/shell. hello.sh or 12cd /data/shellsource hello.sh 前三种方法执行 shell 脚本时都是在当前 shell（称为父 shell）开启一个子 shell 环境，此 shell 脚本就在这个子shell 环境中执行。shell 脚本执行完后子 shell 环境随即关闭，然后又回到父 shell 中。而方法四则是在当前 shell 中执行的。
